extendedInfo.description: The Measure Master Pro calculator for your Android Smartphone is built with the same features and functions, and the same core engine that powers the industry-standard advanced construction-math calculators from Calculated Industries. No learning curve -- just one powerful, easy-to-use calculator app, giving you the power to calculate & solve U.S. and metric unit conversions.- Work in and convert between dimensions: feet-inch-fractions, inch fraction, yards, decimal feet (10ths, 100ths), decimal inches and metric (m, cm, mm)- Calculate weight and weight per volume- Calculate instant solutions for circle area, circumference, arcs- Calculate Length, Width, and Height keys solve for linear, area, volume and perimeter dimensions- Use this calculator to reduce expensive errors when estimating dimensions, costs and materialsDimensional Math and Conversions â¢	Feet-Inch-Fraction, Inch Fraction, Yards â¢	Decimal Feet (10ths, 100ths), Decimal Inches â¢	Preset Fractions (1/2" through 1/64") â¢	Full Metric Conversions (m, cm, mm) â¢	D.M.S. to Decimal Degree Conversions.Dedicated Functions Help You Measure and Calculate: â¢	Linear           o	Feet-Inch-Fractions           o	Yards, Miles           o	Decimal Feet/Inch           o	Millimeters, Centimeters, Meters â¢	Area           o	Feet, Inch, Yards, Acres, Miles           o	Millimeters, Centimeters, Meters           o	Square and Cubic â¢	Volume           o	Feet, Inch, Yards, Miles           o	Millimeters, Centimeters, Meters, â¢	Weight           o	Pounds, Tons           o	Metric Tons, Kilograms â¢	Weight per Volume           o	Tons per Cubic Yard           o	Pounds per Cubic Yard           o	Pounds per Cubic Feet           o	Metric Tons per Cubic Meter           o	Kilograms per Cubic Meter Special Calculator Functions â¢	Entry Editing Backspace Key â with a swipe of a finger â¢	Cost per Unit: Solve unit cost and pricing â¢	Paperless Tape â¢	Board Feet â¢	Memory function â¢	User-Definable Preferences â set custom options: Fractions, Area, Volume, Metric, Degrees.For Designers, Craftsmen, Tradespersons, Fabricators, Woodworkers and Technicians

reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: elwin johnson

reviews.title: Great for Canadian Users!
reviews.comment: Fantastic app for anyone having to work in both metric and imperial.  Very easy and quick to use.  Far better than trying to use a standard metric conversion calculator and do conversion and manual math.  This app understands the units you are putting in and doesn\'t care what unit you put in and what unit you want to work in next, it just understands all the units and just simply works.  Then it lets you see results in whatever unit you like, and if your buddy says, \"now whats that in metric\" just pressing the unit buttons and you can see the results in any unit it supports - and then keep doing the math on that!  There is nothing like doing your calculations in feet and inches then having someone come along and say, \"now add another 1.25m to that\" - without this tool that would be a little time consuming and also error prone.   It also handles unit over flows like 3\' 14\"-5/4.  Sometimes you get adding numbers in your head and it works out this is just what you want to enter as your measurement and it just works.  This is just designed to work will all these units and do it well. The other calculators in this market class are clumsy and incomplete. This is what you want.
